program: Master of Science in Engineering (MSE) in Mechanical Engineering and Applied Mechanics

sections.text: Penn Engineering’s MSE in MEAM offers advanced study in mechanics, design, robotics, and manufacturing for careers in industry and research.

items: Graduate coursework in mechanics, materials, design, and robotics
Technical electives across engineering and applied science
Optional thesis or research credits with faculty advisor
sections.text: Students pursue focused graduate courses with elective flexibility and opportunities for research or a thesis option.

items: Completion of approved graduate course plan
Bachelor’s in engineering or closely related field
GPA and academic standing requirements per Penn Engineering
sections.text: Admission expects engineering preparation; degree completion follows Penn Engineering’s unit and performance policies.
Graduates advance to roles in product design, robotics, advanced manufacturing, R&D, and further doctoral study.
